import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { DataContext } from '../contexts' export default ({children}) => { const { coinList, prices, firstVisit } = useContext(DataContext) console.log( 'CoinList is true? ', Boolean(coinList)) return !coinList ?
Loading Coins...
: !firstVisit && !prices ?
Loading Prices...
:
{children}
}
